00145 BOOLEAN LoadAmbientControlFile( UINT8 ubAmbientID )
00146 {
00147       SGPFILENAME                               zFilename;
00148       HWFILE                                                hFile;
00149       INT32                                           cnt;
00150 
00151 
00152 
00153       // BUILD FILENAME
00154       sprintf( zFilename, "AMBIENT\\%d.bad", ubAmbientID );
00155 
00156       // OPEN, LOAD
00157       hFile = FileOpen( zFilename, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE);
00158       if ( !hFile )
00159       {
00160             return( FALSE );
00161       }
00162 
00163       // READ #
00164       if( !FileRead( hFile, &gsNumAmbData, sizeof( INT16 ), NULL ) )
00165       {
00166             return( FALSE );
00167       }
00168 
00169       // LOOP FOR OTHERS
00170       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < gsNumAmbData; cnt++ )
00171       {
00172             if( !FileRead( hFile, &(gAmbData[ cnt ]), sizeof( AMBIENTDATA_STRUCT ), NULL ) )
00173             {
00174                   return( FALSE );
00175             }
00176 
00177             sprintf( zFilename, "AMBIENT\\%s", gAmbData[ cnt ].zFilename );
00178             strcpy( gAmbData[ cnt ].zFilename, zFilename );
00179       }
00180 
00181       FileClose( hFile );
00182 
00183       return( TRUE );
00184 }
00185 
00186 void GetAmbientDataPtr( AMBIENTDATA_STRUCT **ppAmbData, UINT16 *pusNumData )
00187 {
00188       *ppAmbData        = gAmbData;
00189       *pusNumData       = gsNumAmbData;
00190 }

00192 
00193 void StopAmbients( )
00194 {
00195       SoundStopAllRandom( );
00196 }
00197 
00198 void HandleNewSectorAmbience( UINT8 ubAmbientID )
00199 {
00200       // OK, we could have just loaded a sector, erase all ambient sounds from queue, shutdown all ambient groupings
00201       SoundStopAllRandom( );
00202 
00203       DeleteAllStrategicEventsOfType( EVENT_AMBIENT );
00204 
00205       if( !gfBasement && !gfCaves )
00206       {
00207             if(   LoadAmbientControlFile( ubAmbientID ) )
00208             {
00209                   // OK, load them up!
00210                   BuildDayAmbientSounds( );
00211             }
00212             else
00213             {
00214                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_0, String("Cannot load Ambient data for tileset" ) ); 
00215             }
00216       }
00217 }
00218 
00219 void DeleteAllAmbients()
00220 {
00221       // JA2Gold: it seems that ambient sounds don't get unloaded when we exit a sector!?
00222       SoundStopAllRandom();
00223       DeleteAllStrategicEventsOfType( EVENT_AMBIENT );
00224 }
00225 
00226 UINT32 SetupNewAmbientSound( UINT32 uiAmbientID )
00227 {
00228       RANDOMPARMS rpParms;
00229 
00230       //SoundLog((CHAR8 *)String("  SetupNewAmbientSound()1:  uiAmbientID: '%d'", uiAmbientID ) );
00231       
00232       memset(&rpParms, 0xff, sizeof(RANDOMPARMS));
00233 
00234       rpParms.uiTimeMin       =     gAmbData[ uiAmbientID ].uiMinTime;
00235       rpParms.uiTimeMax       =     gAmbData[ uiAmbientID ].uiMaxTime;
00236       rpParms.uiVolMin        = CalculateSoundEffectsVolume( gAmbData[ uiAmbientID ].uiVol );
00237       rpParms.uiVolMax        = CalculateSoundEffectsVolume( gAmbData[ uiAmbientID ].uiVol );
00238       rpParms.uiPriority      =     GROUP_AMBIENT;
00239 
00240       //SoundLog((CHAR8 *)String("  SetupNewAmbientSound()2:  gAmbData[ uiAmbientID ].zFilename: '%s',  Params: '%s'", gAmbData[ uiAmbientID ].zFilename, &rpParms ) );
00241       
00242       return SoundPlayRandom( gAmbData[ uiAmbientID ].zFilename, &rpParms );  //bug Nr14
00243 }
00244 
00245 
00246 UINT32 StartSteadyStateAmbient( UINT32 ubVolume, UINT32 ubLoops)
00247 {
00248 SOUNDPARMS spParms;
00249 
00250       memset(&spParms, 0xff, sizeof(SOUNDPARMS));
00251 
00252       spParms.uiVolume = CalculateSoundEffectsVolume( ubVolume );
00253       spParms.uiLoop = ubLoops;
00254       spParms.uiPriority=GROUP_AMBIENT;
00255 
00256       return(SoundPlay( gSteadyStateAmbientTable[ gubCurrentSteadyStateAmbience ].zSoundNames[ gubCurrentSteadyStateSound ], &spParms ) );
00257 }
00258 
00259 
00260 
00261 BOOLEAN SetSteadyStateAmbience( UINT8 ubAmbience )
00262 {
00263   BOOLEAN fInNight = FALSE;
00264   INT32     cnt;
00265   UINT8     ubNumSounds = 0;
00266   UINT8     ubChosenSound;
00267 
00268   // Stop all ambients...
00269       if ( guiCurrentSteadyStateSoundHandle != NO_SAMPLE )
00270       {
00271             SoundStop( guiCurrentSteadyStateSoundHandle );
00272             guiCurrentSteadyStateSoundHandle = NO_SAMPLE;
00273       }
00274 
00275   // Determine what time of day we are in ( day/night)
00276       if( gubEnvLightValue >= LIGHT_DUSK_CUTOFF)
00277       {
00278     fInNight = TRUE;
00279   }
00280 
00281   // loop through listing to get num sounds...
00282   for ( cnt = ( fInNight * 4 ); cnt < ( NUM_SOUNDS_PER_TIMEFRAME / 2 ); cnt++ )
00283   {
00284     if ( gSteadyStateAmbientTable[ ubAmbience ].zSoundNames[ cnt ][ 0 ] == 0 )
00285     { 
00286       break;
00287     }  
00288     
00289     ubNumSounds++;
00290   }
00291 
00292   if ( ubNumSounds == 0 )
00293   {
00294     return( FALSE );
00295   }
00296 
00297   // Pick one
00298   ubChosenSound = (UINT8) Random( ubNumSounds );
00299 
00300   // Set!
00301   gubCurrentSteadyStateAmbience = ubAmbience;
00302   gubCurrentSteadyStateSound    = ubChosenSound;
00303 
00304   guiCurrentSteadyStateSoundHandle =  StartSteadyStateAmbient( LOWVOLUME, 0 );
00305 
00306   return( TRUE );
00307 }
